existing_features.title: Create a worker marketplace platform where customers can browse services, view workers by category, and submit contact requests through the platform rather than directly contacting workers
Implement multi-language support for English, Hindi, and Gujarati with language switcher and persistent user preference storage
Create worker submission form allowing workers to register with name, skill, service category, location, profile image, and minimum 3 work images
Create material seller submission form for submitting materials with name, category, description, location, and images
Implement admin dashboard with username/password authentication (credentials: Bharat1213/Bharat1213) displaying separate tabs for materials, workers, and messages
Create career application form for job seekers to submit applications with name, mobile, skills, experience, and message
Create architect project submission form collecting name, project type, location, budget, message, and file uploads
Implement contact flow where customers contact workers or material sellers through Work24 platform, collecting customer name, mobile, and requirements without exposing direct contact information
Create materials listing page displaying materials in a grid with cards showing images, name, category, description, and contact button
Implement onboarding flow that collects user name and language preference, validates input, saves to localStorage, and redirects to home page
Create contact us page displaying official Work24 phone number and email with clickable links and service area information

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement role-based access control in backend with admin permissions for viewing all submissions and managing data
Apply a consistent visual design theme with off-white base color, orange primary color, and green accent color using OKLCH color system with light and dark mode support
